## About Clubul Computer

Clubul Computer is a community-driven technology club dedicated to promoting digital literacy, computer science education, and technological innovation for all ages. Through regular meetups, workshops, and collaborative projects, we create an environment where members can learn, experiment, and grow their technical skills while building meaningful connections.

```{=html}
<div class="row mt-4">
  <div class="col-md-6">
    <div class="card mb-4">
      <div class="card-header bg-success text-white">
        <h3 class="card-title mb-0">Our Mission</h3>
      </div>
      <div class="card-body">
        <p>To make technology accessible, understandable, and enjoyable for everyone, regardless of age or background, by creating inclusive learning environments and supportive communities.</p>
        <h4>Core Values:</h4>
        <ul>
          <li><strong>Inclusivity:</strong> Creating a welcoming space for people of all backgrounds</li>
          <li><strong>Collaboration:</strong> Encouraging knowledge sharing and teamwork</li>
          <li><strong>Hands-on Learning:</strong> Emphasizing practical experience and experimentation</li>
          <li><strong>Community Impact:</strong> Using technology to address local challenges</li>
        </ul>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>

  <div class="col-md-6">
    <div class="card mb-4">
      <div class="card-header bg-success text-white">
        <h3 class="card-title mb-0">What We Offer</h3>
      </div>
      <div class="card-body">
        <ul>
          <li><strong>Regular Meetups:</strong> Monthly gatherings to discuss technology trends, share projects, and solve problems together</li>
          <li><strong>Workshops:</strong> Hands-on learning sessions for various technologies and skills</li>
          <li><strong>Youth Programs:</strong> Age-appropriate tech education for children and teens</li>
          <li><strong>Mentorship:</strong> Connecting beginners with experienced practitioners</li>
          <li><strong>Project Collaboration:</strong> Opportunities to work on real-world projects with others</li>
          <li><strong>Resources Library:</strong> Access to learning materials, tools, and equipment</li>
        </ul>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>
```

## Community Showcase

See what our members have been creating and learning through their participation in Clubul Computer.

```{=html}
<div class="row mt-4">
  <div class="col-md-6">
    <div class="card mb-4">
      <div class="card-header">
        <h3 class="card-title mb-0">Open Source Educational Tools</h3>
        <span class="badge bg-primary">Community Project</span>
      </div>
      <div class="card-body">
        <p>A collaborative effort to develop accessible, open-source educational tools for teaching programming concepts in Romanian schools.</p>
        <p><strong>Technologies:</strong> Python, JavaScript, HTML/CSS, Educational design</p>
        <p><strong>Impact:</strong> Used in 150+ schools, reaching over 5000+ students</p>
        <a href="https://www.clubul.computer/t/open-source" class="btn btn-primary">View Project</a>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>

  <div class="col-md-6">
    <div class="card mb-4">
      <div class="card-header">
        <h3 class="card-title mb-0">Community Air Quality Monitor</h3>
        <span class="badge bg-primary">Hardware Project</span>
      </div>
      <div class="card-body">
        <p>A network of low-cost air quality sensors developed by club members to provide real-time environmental data for local communities.</p>
        <p><strong>Technologies:</strong> Arduino, ESP32, IoT, LoRaWAN, Data visualization</p>
        <p><strong>Impact:</strong> 25 sensors deployed across the city, open data available to all citizens</p>
        <a href="https://www.clubul.computer/t/open-source" class="btn btn-primary">View Project</a>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>
```

## Membership & Participation

Clubul Computer welcomes participants of all backgrounds and skill levels, from complete beginners to experienced professionals.

```{=html}
<div class="row mt-4">
  <div class="col-md-6">
    <div class="security-feature">
      <h3>How to Join</h3>
      <p>Becoming a part of Clubul Computer is simple and open to all interested in technology:</p>
      <ul>
        <li>Attend any of our open events or monthly meetups</li>
        <li>Register on our community platform for updates and discussions</li>
        <li>Volunteer to help organize events or lead workshops</li>
        <li>Propose a project or initiative aligned with our mission</li>
      </ul>
      <p>There are no formal membership requirements or fees, though some specialized workshops/trainings may have material costs.</p>
    </div>
  </div>

  <div class="col-md-6">
    <div class="security-feature">
      <h3>Upcoming Opportunities</h3>
      <p>Get involved with these upcoming activities:</p>
      <ul>
        <li><strong>Monthly Meetup:</strong> Check the calendar</li>
        <li><strong>Clubul Computer Junior</strong> Contact us</li>
        <li><strong>Workshops:</strong> Check the calendar and ask for a specific workshop</li>
        <li><strong>Open Source Contribution Day:</strong> Ongoing</li>
        <li><strong>Summer Tech Camp:</strong> July 15-September 15, 2025</li>
      </ul>
      <p>All events are held at our location unless otherwise specified.</p>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>
```
